summary: Tested Google Drive contributor feature - creating empty sections without URL and generating contributor links with /d/ prefix. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Empty Google Drive section creation works correctly - POST /api/galleries/{id}/gdrive-sections with null gdrive_url
Contributor link generation uses /d/ prefix for gdrive sections
Contributor form has all required fields: Name, Role (optional), Google Drive URL
Instructions for making folder public are displayed
Backend validates: missing name (400), missing URL (400), invalid URL format (400)
Toast message correctly shows: 'Google Drive section created! Generate a contributor link to let your supplier submit their folder.'
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Empty_GDrive_Section and TEST_UI_GDrive_Section for testing (cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Google Drive contributor feature fully tested. Key test URLs: Contributor page at /d/USUwqE_JTv1veEln7RPo5A works correctly. Gallery ID for Test GDrive Gallery: 9c18f814-2d34-4009-9b68-e4bb181f2549

create_empty_gdrive_section.details: POST /api/galleries/{id}/gdrive-sections with null gdrive_url creates empty section

contributor_link_prefix.details: Google Drive sections use /d/ prefix for contributor links

copy_link_button.details: Copy Link button works and copies URL to clipboard

qr_code_button.details: QR Code button opens modal with QR code and download option

contributor_page_access.details: Contributor page at /d/{link} loads correctly with form

contributor_form_fields.details: Form has Name (required), Role (optional), Google Drive URL (required), and instructions

validation_errors.details: Missing name returns 400, missing URL returns 400, invalid URL returns 400

success_toast_message.details: Toast shows 'Google Drive section created! Generate a contributor link to let your supplier submit their folder.'
